samples.description:
Contains materials used in the other samples.

If materials appear pink, from the top menu, go to "Window > Rendering > Render Pipeline Converter", choose "Built-in to URP" or "Built-in to HDRP", select all materials, click "Initialize Converters", and lastly click "Convert Assets".

Contains scenes showing off agent movements.

You must also import the "Materials" sample for this to work.

Contains a basic sample showing keyboard agent controls. Move the agent using WASD or the arrow keys.

You must also import the "Materials" sample for this to work.

Demonstrates an agent which roams until it detects a box, after which it will approach and destroy the box.

You must also import the "Materials" sample for this to work.

An exercise to get you familiar with Kaiju Agents. You will need to complete an agent to keep floor tiles clean.

You must also import the "Materials" sample for this to work.

An exercise featuring microbes which can mate with and eat each other.

You must also import the "Materials" sample for this to work.

An exercise featuring two teams of troopers with blasters competing in a game of capture the flag.

You must also import the "Materials" sample for this to work.
